Disease.content:

Sure! Here are the entities in the paragraph:

* "level" (a measure of the amount of a substance in the body)
* "4497" (a numerical value)
* "ng/ml" (an abbreviation for "nanograms per milliliter," a unit of measurement)

None of these entities can be considered "disease" entities.
